episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.plot: Rebecca goes into an early labor; Randall finds his biological father; Kevin faces a personal and professional crisis; Kate finds herself at a low point.

episodes.title: The Big Three
episodes.plot: Jack and Rebecca struggle with raising a family; Beth grows suspicious of William; Kate stresses over her weight loss; Kevin faces fallout from his meltdown.

episodes.title: Kyle
episodes.plot: Rebecca pays a surprise visit, Kevin makes plans to move, and Toby prepares a special day for Kate.

episodes.title: The Pool
episodes.plot: Jack and Rebecca take their kids to the community pool; Kevin experiences his first NYC audition; Kate stalks Toby's ex; William's past sends Randall spinning.

episodes.title: The Game Plan
episodes.plot: Jack and Rebecca disagree about the future, Toby makes a gesture to Kate which backfires, Beth surprises Randall, while Kevin and William have a heart-to-heart.

episodes.title: Career Days
episodes.plot: Jack and Rebecca face a dilemma, Randall puts his foot down, Kate lands a new job, and Kevin finds himself in an unusual situation.

episodes.title: The Best Washing Machine in the Whole World
episodes.plot: Old tensions between Kevin and Randall resurface, Beth discovers a secret, while Toby makes a change which knocks Kate off course.

episodes.title: Pilgrim Rick
episodes.plot: As Jack and Rebecca face a disastrous Thanksgiving, the family gather at Randall's house for the occasion.

episodes.title: The Trip
episodes.plot: As Jack and Rebecca deal with Randall's questions about his parents, the siblings head to the family cabin for a post-Thanksgiving trip.

episodes.title: Last Christmas
episodes.plot: At Christmas, Jack and Rebecca are unexpectedly reunited with an old friend, while Kevin, Randall and Kate face different holiday dramas.

episodes.title: The Right Thing to Do
episodes.plot: Jack and Rebecca receive surprising news, Kate tries to help Toby, Randall feels conflicted about William and Jessie, while Kevin must make a choice.

episodes.title: The Big Day
episodes.plot: As Rebecca's pregnancy drags on, she forgets Jack's birthday, Nathan copes with his grief, and Randall inadvertently intervenes in a difficult marriage.

episodes.title: Three Sentences
episodes.plot: Jack and Rebecca throw three separate birthday parties; Toby helps Kevin with a romantic gesture; Kate gets a new plan; Randall helps William with his bucket list.

episodes.title: I Call Marriage
episodes.plot: Jack and Rebecca receive shocking news, Randall feels pressure both at work and at home, Kate's plans are thrown off kilter, and Kevin tries to win over Sophie.

episodes.title: Jack Pearson's Son
episodes.plot: Jack and Rebecca's Valentine's Day goes south; Toby and Kate dig deep; Kevin preps for opening night; A tightly wound Randall begins to unravel.

episodes.title: Memphis
episodes.plot: Randall and William take a road trip to Memphis, where Randall learns about William's past.

episodes.title: What Now?
episodes.plot: Jack and Rebecca argue before the beginning of her tour, Kevin faces another opening night, while the entire family gathers at Randall's for an unusual party.

episodes.title: Moonshadow
episodes.plot: Jack attempts to meet Rebecca and make things right; Kate, Kevin and Randall make important decisions about their respective futures.
